com.fluidops.iwb.cache
Class LastFMCache

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.cache.LastFMCache

public class LastFMCache
extends java.lang.Object

Cache for LastFM Data. Note: config parameter lastFMKey is required in config.prop - (Singleton) Main memory cache, which is not persisted at the moment - Retrieves and maintains LastFMCache.LastFMData instances in a hashmap (key=musicbrainz id) - Lookup by mbid, if not available in cache => remote API access - Currently access to artist information, can be easily extended LastFM Access requires the (slightly modified) code from the lastFM Java API, if additional changes are required use the source code contained in the JAR.

Author:
as

Method Detail

getInstance

public static LastFMCache getInstance()
Return the one and only instance

Returns:

getArtist

public LastFMCache.ArtistLastFMData getArtist(java.lang.String mbid)
Retrieve artist information from the cache. If the data is not present in the cache, a remote lookup (=2 remote requests) is performed and the cache is updated. The accessCount of the LastFMCache.LastFMData instance is increased.

Parameters:
mbid - the music brainz id of the artist
Returns:
the artist data or null (if mbid does not correspond to an artist)
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the provided mbid does not correspond to cached LastFMCache.ArtistLastFMData
